entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a blank line between a namespace and a class declaration when creating new item #65921
  • Consider displaying preview APIs differently #65915

Closed

  • Rename constantly failing in MAUI Apps #65397

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unnecessary discards #65923
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix several issues with CreateSpan support #65919
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65917
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add tests for CheckInvocationArgMixing #65916
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Move `CSharpMakeStatementAsynchronousCodeFixTests` to `VerifyCS` #65922
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove options that have the same editorconfig name #65800
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Minor cleanup in OptionStore #65450
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify lsif generation concepts #65858
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade to .net 7 release version #65839
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix inline rename in MAUI #65818
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65913
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65912
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Pass cancellation token consistently through lsif generator. #65875
    Area-IDE
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move couple of tests to new testing library #63055
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add more test scenarios for symbol completion after scoped #65747
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove code for cloning compilations for skeleton references #65842
    Area-IDE
